commit message: Update help text of main screen.
Now that we're on Android 4, get rid of some NFC backports.
Use loader for getting current wallet address.
Cache expensive transaction properties in list adapter.
Detect internal transactions by tx.getPurpose() only. Bitcoinj has stopped using pay-to-pubkey for them.
When restoring from a wallet, do a better estimation of the replaying state.
Fix 'show password' behaviour for numeric passwords.
Stand back a little bit. Bitcoin Wallet is a team effort.
Remove remains of automatic key rotation. Will implement manual key rotation.
Fix crash when entering very high fiat amounts.
